li.p: The IPv4 Stack: Handles 32-bit addresses, uses ARP (Address Resolution Protocol) to find MAC addresses, and manages its own routing table.

p.span: Handles 128-bit addresses, uses NDP (Neighbor Discovery Protocol) instead of ARP, and has a completely redesigned packet header

span.span: Because the headers are structured differently, they are
